original_title: Didou et l'assistant du Père Noël
overview: Louie and Yoko meet Tom, one of Santa’s elves. Tom has been chosen by Santa to help him on Christmas Eve but he suffers from vertigo, he’s afraid of the dark, and lacks an enormous amount of self-confidence. With his drawings, Louie is able to help Tom overcome his fears in an adventure that leads them to Santa’s Grotto, where the elves make toys.
title: Louie and Santa's Assistant
